text: Florin Olteanu (born 30 June 1981) is a Romanian footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Liga III side CSM Alexandria.Florin Olteanu, portar Alexandria: “Vrem să câștigăm fiecare meci și dacă vom fi în partea superioară a clasamentului atunci ne vom dori și promovarea”. teresport.ro In his career Olteanu also played for teams such as Astra Ploiești, Petrolul Ploiești, Jiul Petroșani, Unirea Alba Iulia, Săgeata Stejaru or Săgeata Năvodari, among others.Săgeata Stejarul…. sportulph.wordpress.com SĂ‚GEATA STEJARU: Paradisul din Deltă. liga2.prosport.ro ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:People from Alexandria, Romania Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:FC Astra Giurgiu players Category:CSO Plopeni players Category:FC Petrolul Ploiești players Category:CSM Jiul Petroșani players Category:FC Unirea Alba Iulia players Category:AFC Săgeata Năvodari players
title: Florin Olteanu (footballer)
